task_text: Provide real-world oriented guidance: keep --seed-mode sql useful for deterministic test/analysis; add a separate file with concrete search test cases on the seeded corpus (multilingual / cross-domain / ambiguous terms) for AI agents.
summary: Softened rules wording to avoid over-prescribing chroma, added docs/skills_rules/search_test_cases.md with copy-paste search scenarios targeting the seeded test DB, and verified a deterministic example run against the test corpus.

outcome.notes: Test-case doc now uses AI_SKILLS_DB/AI_SKILLS_CHROMA to ensure commands run against the seed test corpus.

tests: ./ai_mem.sh search (seed-mode sql) on seeded test DB (OK)
